dmca.title: Playboy DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Letter
http://celeb4life.blogspot.com/2007/10/kim-kardashian-playboy-pictures.html

-- 
Alice Wu  |  Web Products  |  Legal Support
Google Inc.  |  1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View  |  CA  |  94043
650.253.0688 voice  |  650.618.1806 facsimile  alicewu@google.com
Page 1 of2 
Cherkashina, Tatyana fcuy €YVO £ i:. -- I L1 
From: Cherkashina, Tatyana 
Sent: Wednesday, November 07, 2007 4:06 PM 
To: `Slogger Help' 
Subject: URGENT! SECOND REQUEST! DMCA COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE www.bIogspot.com (66.102.15.100) 
Importance: High 
Fo!Iow Up Flag: Follow up 
Flag Status: Orange 
Dear Sir or Madam, 
Please advise on the status of the attached below complaint. 
Sincerely, 
Tatyana Cherkashina 
Playboy Enterprises. Inc. 
From: Cherkashina, T&yana 
Sent: Monday, October 29, 2007 4:50 PM 
To: `support@blogger.com' 
Subject: URGENT! DMCA COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE www.blogspot.com (66.102.15.100) 
PLESE NOTE THAT YOU HAVE ENABLED PLAYBOY TO EMAIL DMCA COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICES! 
October 29, 2007 
URGENT! 
Email support©blogger.com 
Google, Inc. 
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
Dear Sir or Madam: 
It has been brought to our attention that web pages at www.bloasoot.com (66.102.15.100) display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. (``Playboy''). All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy. 
I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on www.bIogspot.com (66.102.15.100) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. 
Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on www.bIogspot.com (66.102.15.100) and on all web pages under your control. 
Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links: 
http://celeb4life.blogspot.com/2007/1 0/kim-kardashian-Dlavbov-pictures.html 
11/7/2007 
OO/LOOd SLOU 9O:LL LOO/LO/LL tO 99 LE qUSWqJPdS MP1 XoqXPJ:woJj 
Page 2 of 2 
I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., [redacted] Lakeshore Drive, Chicago. Illinois 60611, Fax [redacted], phone [redacted] E-mail address is tcherkashinaplayboy.com. 
We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately. 
This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. 
PLAYB Y ENT RISES INTERNATIONAL, INC. 
Tatyan her ma 
Intellectual Property Assistant 
11/7/2007
